00009 #include <gtest/gtest.h>
00010 #include <analyzer.h>
00011 #include <jma_analyzer.h>
00012 
00013 using namespace jma;
00014 
00015 class AnalyzerTest : public ::testing::Test
00016 {
00017 protected:
00018     virtual void SetUp() {
00019         analyzer_ = new JMA_Analyzer;
00020         ASSERT_TRUE(analyzer_ != NULL);
00021     }
00022 
00023     virtual void TearDown() {
00024         delete analyzer_;
00025     }
00026 
00027     Analyzer* analyzer_;
00028 };
00029 
00030 TEST_F(AnalyzerTest, getOptionDefault) {
00031     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING));
00032     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST));
00033     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET));
00034     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FULL_CATEGORY));
00035     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_COMPOUND_MORPHOLOGY));
00036     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_DECOMPOSE_USER_NOUN));
00037     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HIRAGANA));
00038     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_KATAKANA));
00039     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HALF_WIDTH));
00040     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_FULL_WIDTH));
00041     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_LOWER_CASE));
00042     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_UPPER_CASE));
00043 }
00044 
00045 TEST_F(AnalyzerTest, setOption) {
00046     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING, 0);
00047     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING));
00048 
00049     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING, -1);
00050     EXPECT_EQ(-1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING));
00051 
00052     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST, 5);
00053     EXPECT_EQ(5, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST));
00054 
00055     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST, 3.3);
00056     EXPECT_EQ(3.3, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST));
00057 
00058     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST, 1000);
00059     EXPECT_EQ(1000, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST));
00060 
00061     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST, 0);
00062     EXPECT_EQ(1000, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST)) << "invalid nbest value should take no effect";
00063 
00064     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST, -5);
00065     EXPECT_EQ(1000, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST)) << "invalid nbest value should take no effect";
00066 
00067     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET, 1);
00068     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET));
00069 
00070     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET, -1);
00071     EXPECT_EQ(-1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET));
00072 
00073     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FULL_CATEGORY, 1);
00074     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FULL_CATEGORY));
00075 
00076     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_COMPOUND_MORPHOLOGY, 0);
00077     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_COMPOUND_MORPHOLOGY));
00078 
00079     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_COMPOUND_MORPHOLOGY, -1);
00080     EXPECT_EQ(-1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_COMPOUND_MORPHOLOGY));
00081 
00082     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_DECOMPOSE_USER_NOUN, 1);
00083     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_DECOMPOSE_USER_NOUN));
00084 
00085     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HIRAGANA, 1);
00086     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HIRAGANA));
00087 
00088     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_KATAKANA, 1);
00089     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_KATAKANA));
00090 
00091     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HALF_WIDTH, 1);
00092     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HALF_WIDTH));
00093 
00094     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_FULL_WIDTH, 1);
00095     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_FULL_WIDTH));
00096 
00097     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_LOWER_CASE, 1);
00098     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_LOWER_CASE));
00099 
00100     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_UPPER_CASE, 1);
00101     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_UPPER_CASE));
00102 }

00104 TEST_F(AnalyzerTest, getPOSDelimiterDefault) {
00105     EXPECT_STREQ("/", analyzer_->getPOSDelimiter());
00106 }
00107 
00108 TEST_F(AnalyzerTest, setPOSDelimiter) {
00109     analyzer_->setPOSDelimiter("#");
00110     EXPECT_STREQ("#", analyzer_->getPOSDelimiter());
00111 }
00112 
00113 TEST_F(AnalyzerTest, getWordDelimiterDefault) {
00114     EXPECT_STREQ("  ", analyzer_->getWordDelimiter());
00115 }
00116 
00117 TEST_F(AnalyzerTest, setWordDelimiter) {
00118     analyzer_->setWordDelimiter("@");
00119     EXPECT_STREQ("@", analyzer_->getWordDelimiter());
00120 }
